job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: Role: Infra DevOps engineer<br>Location: Morrisville, NC (remote till covid)<br>Mode: Contract<br><br>Detailed Job description:<br>• Minimum 5 years as an Infrastructure DevOps or automation engineer<br>• Proficient in server side scripting<br>• Knowledge of DevOps capabilities such as Continuous Integration and Delivery (CI/CD), Automated Testing, etc.<br>• Knowledge on Terraform is must preferably in Azure<br>• Good exposure on Micro services architecture and their deployment in cloud world. (Especially Azure +Terraform)<br>• Should have worked on setting up & troubleshooting Kubernetes Clusters in Production ready environment<br>• Help teams in migration from monolithic application to Micro services using containerization solutions (Docker, Kubernetes)<br>• Worked on onboarding Micro services (Middleware/UI) components using DevOps technique & look for improvements<br>• Prior experience in automating CI/CD process, platform services using open source tools<br><br>jerrin@smartitframe.com
